events.name: tour.event.route.ready
events.description: Fired when a route's key anchors are present and the page/view is interactive

events.name: tour.event.auth.success
events.description: Fired after successful authentication and before redirecting to Studio

events.name: tour.event.auth.failed
events.description: Fired when an authentication attempt fails and UI error state is set

events.name: tour.event.studio.view.changed
events.description: Fired when the Studio current view changes via sidebar or deep-link handling

events.name: tour.event.studio.generate.started
events.description: Fired when thumbnail generation starts from the Studio submit button

events.name: tour.event.studio.generate.complete
events.description: Fired when generation completes with one or more successful outputs

events.name: tour.event.studio.generate.failed
events.description: Fired when generation fails fully or partially

events.name: tour.event.modal.opened
events.description: Fired when a tracked modal/dialog is opened

events.name: tour.event.modal.closed
events.description: Fired when a tracked modal/dialog is closed
